description.value: Rather than releasing pneuma in bursts, you maintain a constant flow around your body. The element clings to you like a second skin

prerequisites.other: Pneuma Strike (any element), chosen elemental Mastery 4

system.benefits:
For one element you have Pneuma Strike, you can spend 4 Energy as a [Combat] action to shroud yourself in that element for 1 minute:

  • Fire: Deal [[/damage 1d8 type=fire]] damage to creatures that hit you with melee attacks
  • Water: Gain +2 DR and resistance to fire damage
  • Air: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks
  • Earth: Gain +4 DR but movement speed reduced by 10 feet
